title: Joop van Nellen
text: Johannes Cornelis "Joop" van Nellen (15 March 1910 – 14 November 1992) was a Dutch <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Netherlands%20national%20football%20team">Netherlands</a> in the <a href="1934%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1934 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="DHC%20Delft">DHC Delft</a>.
